name: Pong (itch) (codescapade)
description:
This is a remake of the classic pong game I made to test out some basic features of the game engine I'm making.
You play against the computer. First to 5 points wins.


Controls:
Up-down arrow or W-S to move the left paddle up or down.
P to pause the game.
M to mute the sounds effects.
Spacebar is the action button to launch the ball.
